description.@en: A viridescent, electrified set of throwing stars unerringly hurtle towards your foes.

criticalFailure.@en: The throwing star dances overhead, sparking with fireworks. With a whirring sound, it strikes one of your allies (GMâ€™s discretion). They suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage and are Disarmed.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes cannot Resist this Magick.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of foes you can see equal to your [WB]. Each foe suffers [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage. In addition, if your foes fail to Resist with a successful Coordination Test, they are Disarmed.

reagents.@en: A throwing star carved from Wytchstone (expended)
